author: Staff Reporter
text:
A self-immolation bid by a farmer and his family members outside the Collectorate here was foiled by the police on Monday.

Farmer Chinnasamy of Thuduganahalli Kaverikottai owns a patta land in Sokkadi village, where he had sunk a borewell and was cultivating the land.

Land issue

According to sources, Chinnasamy was denied entry to his own plot by another farmer who owned the adjacent plot. Despite a complaint to the police, no action was taken, it has been alleged. Also, Chinnasamy's hut was set ablaze by the neighbouring land owner recently, Chinnasamy has alleged.

The farmer, along with his wife and children, arrived outside the Collectorate on Monday and tried to immolate themselves by dousing kerosene. The police stationed there foiled the bid and secured the family to the police station.
title: Self-immolation attempt by farmer, family foiled
